Test Name: Mitochondrial Full Genome Analysis, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To analyze the complete mitochondrial genome via next-generation sequencing for detection and characterization of genetic variants in clinical or research samples.
Container: Microcentrifuge tube (kept on dry ice or in a cooler for transport)
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher), thermocycler, magnetic stand, microcentrifuge, fluorometer/qPCR instrument, Bioanalyzer or TapeStation
